metadata.description:
Envelope-based Limiter V1.0
A brick-wall peak limiter that works by writing precise volume automation envelopes. Instead of using a real-time plugin, it analyzes the selected audio item offline and creates envelope points that tame peaks — giving you full visual control and editability.
Features: - Configurable ceiling (dB), attack (ms), release (ms), and analysis window (ms) - Infinity ratio — true brick-wall limiting - Per-window gain reduction for precise automation - Merges nearby peaks into smooth regions - Fully undoable (Ctrl+Z / Cmd+Z)
Usage: 1. Select an audio item on a track 2. Run the script from the Actions list 3. Adjust parameters in the dialog box 4. Click OK — automation is written to the track volume envelope

version.author: Dima Gorelik
version.changelog: Initial release - Brick-wall peak limiter via volume automation - Dialog box with ceiling, attack, release, and analysis window parameters - Automatic peak detection using AudioAccessor API - Smart merging of consecutive peak regions
